WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing for failure to meet Posting Guidelines. That and I think the issue he may be referencing has already been fixed.
WorkItem.Description:
When you upgrade from wowhead there are exasperates messages "unable to upgrade .. due to error : ..." and you must click on the button [OK]
 
This message is unworkable, I am not intresse, i click ok , I continued import
But 10sec later , a new message ...  
And it continues like this hundreds of times  !!!
 
it would be better to display messages at the end and did not ask to press the button for each error
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Suppress error message with OK button

Comments.Message: We don't understand what you're talking about. Please help us out, by following the bug reporting guidelines.
